article.title: General Dynamics to Support Signal Brigade in Middle East
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Dynamics Information Technology Incorporated, Fairfax, Virginia, was awarded a $12,212,625 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the support services to the 160th Signal Brigade and their subordinate commands with the U.S. Central Command area of responsibility. Work will be performed in Kuwait, Qatar, and Afghanistan, with an estimated completion date of March 31, 2017. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Huachuca, Arizona, is the contracting activity.
